title: Customer Harassment Policy
introduction: Queue Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company"), as an enterprise operating the app and web service trading platform "APPEXIT," places importance on ensuring that all employees can work in a safe and healthy environment. We hereby declare that we will take firm action against excessive demands from customers (including both sellers and buyers) and socially unreasonable behavior (customer harassment).

section1.title: 1. Basic Policy
section1.content: As an app and web service trading platform, the Company aims to provide an environment where both sellers and buyers can transact with confidence. We sincerely accept opinions and requests from customers and strive to improve our services. However, we may restrict our response to the following behaviors or take legal measures, considering them as customer harassment.

stance.title: Our Stance
items: We prioritize the physical and mental health and safety of our employees
We value mutual respect between customers (sellers and buyers) and employees
We will not comply with demands that exceed socially acceptable limits
We will cooperate with police and lawyers as necessary
We strive to maintain a healthy trading environment

section2.title: 2. Definition of Customer Harassment
section2.intro: The Company defines the following behaviors as customer harassment:

violent.title: (1) Violent and Threatening Behavior
items: Physical violence or threats of violence
Threatening with loud voices or shouting
Intimidating actions such as throwing or hitting objects
Behavior that threatens the safety of employees

mental.title: (2) Mental Attacks
items: Statements denying personality, insulting behavior
Discriminatory remarks (gender, race, nationality, age, disability, etc.)
Persistent scolding or preaching
Slander on social media or the internet

excessive.title: (3) Excessive Demands
items: Demands exceeding the platform's terms of service
Compensation demands for transaction troubles not attributable to the Company
Demands for fee waivers or unreasonable discounts
Demands for unfair preferential treatment over other users
Demands to force or obstruct transactions with specific sellers or buyers
Demands for money or bribes from individual employees
Unreasonable demands for changes to conditions after sale completion

obstruction.title: (4) Business Obstruction
items: Long-term detention, squatting in online calls
Persistent phone calls, emails, or chat messages
Repeating the same inquiries
Repeatedly demanding changes in responders without valid reason
Coercing recording, videotaping, or screenshots
Repeated contact outside business hours or late at night
Applications for false information or fraudulent transactions

sexual.title: (5) Sexual Behavior
items: Sexual remarks or obscene behavior
Demands for romantic relationships or sexual relations
Inappropriate comments about appearance
Unnecessary physical contact

authority.title: (6) Behavior Using Authority
items: Threats such as "I'll spread it on social media" or "I'll write bad reviews on review sites"
Intimidation such as "I'll consult a lawyer" (excluding legitimate exercise of rights)
Threats such as "I'll tell the media" or "I'll make it news"
Unreasonable pressure such as "I'll report to the consumer center"
Unjust threats such as "I'll report to relevant government agencies"
Pressure using influential positions

section3.title: 3. Response Policy
section3.intro: When determined to be customer harassment, the Company will take the following actions:

warning.title: (1) Warning and Response Restrictions
items: Warnings against inappropriate behavior
Restrictions on response time and methods (written only, specific time periods only, etc.)
Fixing or changing response staff
Multiple staff response
Recording calls, keeping records of exchanges

restriction.title: (2) Service Provision Restriction/Suspension
items: Temporary or permanent account suspension
Refusal of future service use
Restriction of listing/purchase functions
Restriction of messaging functions
Cancellation of ongoing transactions
Platform withdrawal processing

legal.title: (3) Legal Measures
items: Reporting to police
Warnings through lawyers
Filing civil lawsuits (compensation claims, etc.)
Criminal prosecution (threat, insult, business obstruction, etc.)

section4.title: 4. Legitimate Opinions and Requests
section4.intro: The Company sincerely accepts legitimate opinions, requests, and feedback from customers. The following communications do not constitute customer harassment:
items: Appropriate feedback on platform malfunctions or technical issues
Confirmation of transaction conditions or terms of service
Consultation on transaction troubles based on legitimate rights
Reasonable questions about fees or service content
Constructive suggestions for service improvement
Legitimate inquiries about app/service transfers
Legitimate negotiations regarding sales contracts
Requests within the range of social norms
section4.note: However, even for these contents, if the manner or frequency is unreasonable by social norms, it may be judged as customer harassment.

section5.title: 5. Response to Employees
section5.intro: The Company takes the following measures to prevent employees from being victims of customer harassment:

education.title: Education and Training
items: Regular training on customer harassment
Learning appropriate response methods
Dissemination of escalation procedures

support.title: Support System
items: Establishment of consultation desks
Support from supervisors and colleagues
Consultation with specialists (lawyers, counselors, etc.) as needed
Mental care for victimized employees

environment.title: Work Environment Improvement
items: Building a system where employees do not respond alone
Preservation of records and evidence
Securing safe response locations

section6.title: 6. Request to Customers
section6.intro: The Company strives to ensure that all customers (sellers and buyers) can use our services comfortably. To maintain a healthy trading environment, we ask for your cooperation on the following points:
items: Please understand that employees are also human beings
Please engage in constructive communication based on mutual respect
Please try to engage in calm dialogue without becoming emotional
Please make requests within the range of social norms
Please comply with the platform's terms of service
Please understand employee explanations and judgments
Please treat transaction partners (sellers/buyers) with courtesy

section7.title: 7. Related Laws and Regulations
section7.intro: Customer harassment may violate the following laws and regulations:
items: Penal Code (threat, coercion, insult, defamation, business obstruction, etc.)
Act on Prevention of Unjust Acts by Organized Crime Group Members
Anti-Stalking Act
Minor Offenses Act
Civil Code (tort)
Act on Comprehensive Promotion of Labor Measures (power harassment prevention measures)

section8.title: 8. Consultation Contact
section8.intro: For consultations or inquiries regarding customer harassment, please contact the following:

customerContact.title: Customer Consultation Contact
customerContact.hours: Reception Hours: Weekdays 10:00-18:00 (Excluding weekends and holidays)

employeeContact.title: Internal Consultation Contact for Employees
employeeContact.note: *This is a contact for employees only

section9.title: 9. Review of This Policy
section9.content: The Company will review this policy as appropriate in response to changes in social conditions, revisions of laws and regulations, etc. If there are any changes, they will be published on this website.

finally.title: Finally
finally.content: As an app and web service trading platform, the Company aims to build a healthy trading environment based on mutual respect between customers (sellers and buyers) and employees. While we sincerely accept opinions and requests from customers as valuable opportunities for service improvement, we also consider it our important responsibility to protect the human rights and dignity of our employees, and to provide an environment where all users can transact with confidence. We kindly ask for your understanding and cooperation.
